item.title: Hello, Attention: Building a Deep Learning Engine from Zero
item.description: Why I am re-inventing the wheel by building a GPT engine in pure C++.

item.title: About Me
item.description:
The Mission

I am a double-degree student in Mathematics and Computer Science, currently strictly focused on Systems Engineering and High-Performance Computing (HPC) for AI.

My philosophy is simple:

“Don’t just import it. Build it.”

While the industry rushes to use the latest frameworks, I am taking a step back to understand the machinery. I am building deep learning engines from scratch—starting with Python, moving to C++, and optimizing with CUDA kernels—to bridge the gap between abstract mathematics and bare-metal performance.
